name: A normal gamer day
description:
Welcome in a normal gamer day!

What do you do as a gamer ? Play video games!

So you have to play a mini game, Zomb,  to get a good score.

In this mini game you play Damien!

(this guy)

And you try to survive against the zombies:

There is a PROBLEM!!!!!

As a gamer your room is very very dirty and cockroaches live with you!

So you have to crush them, otherwise you're gonna die!

Clean your room and get a good score!!!

It's a game made in the score space jam in 3 days with the theme DECAY.

So you can find bugs... Thanks for reporting them!
